articles.title: Laver Cup: Andy Murray hoping for final chance to play with Roger Federer for Team Europe in London - Sky Sports
articles.description: Andy Murray is hoping he will get a final chance to play with Roger Federer at the Laver Cup next week, the last event before the Swiss star's retirement from tennis.
articles.content:

articles.title: Burial site with 445 bodies outside Izyum shows evidence of war crimes, Ukraine says - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Hundreds of bodies discovered in the newly liberated Kharkiv region would represent the biggest unmarked grave in Europe since the aftermath of the Balkan wars of the 1990s
